name: Casson & Berry Plan of Manchester & Salford (c.1741-57)
description: Eighteenth-century map with decorative oak leaf borders and corner shells, featuring eighteen views, inset of 1650 plan, southwestern prospect, and architectural illustrations.
notes:
IIIF: https://www.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-C-00017-00070-MANCHESTER-00057
Image: https://image.digitalcollections.manchester.ac.uk/iiif/PR-C-00017-00070-MANCHESTER-00057-000-00001.jp2
Third version with features from 1746 edition. Engraved by B. Cole, printed by Palmer & Howe.

AllMaps georeferenced: 4 GCPs (Jan 2026). Also used in manchester-gis as Berry 1750 with mapId 811b04a06391adb1.
